Make a difference

Our volunteers make a difference in the lives of so many. It is through the efforts of our volunteers that Myissues is able to offer such valued service to our customers. Volunteers reflect the diversity of our community, and are the heart of community to community Centers â€“ an integral part of our past and vital to our future. Volunteers uphold our mission, share our vision, and embrace our values. We are committed to supporting volunteers with the resources necessary to implement our programs. This partnership enriches the services we provide and strengthens our community.

Benefits:

  • Work experience
  • Reference letter and/or Referral letter
  • Extra benefits for members of MyIssues such as a volunteer sticker on your profile on the website banner
  • Bonus on cheque if you receive goverment addistant and qualify
  • Meeting new people
  • Having fun
  • Pride in yourself and what you can accomplish
  • Great work ethics
  • Extra visits to on line food bank
